Key Match Events: Poole and his Washington Wizards hosted Green's Golden State Warriors and taunted each other during the game
At one point, Wizards rookie Carlton 'Bub' Carrington started chatting with the four-time champ -- before Poole intervened and put a stop to it
Green pointed at Poole when Stephen Curry hit a deep ball right at the buzzer
The two were also pretty physical with each other in the paint
Post-Match Reflections: Green credited Poole for playing 'a lot better' compared to last season and said he is taking smarter shots
Golden State head coach Steve Kerr admitted Green's punch 'compromised' the Warriors' 2022-23 season and it was clear the two couldn't coexist
Miscellaneous Highlights: It's been two years since Draymond Green punched Jordan Poole in practice
Green reportedly out at least 3 more weeks after beginning counseling
